title: Transfer server from NA Server to Garena Thai
body:
Hi, I played lol for more than 3 years in only NA server. But recently I moved to Thailand and people over here play lol only in Garena. I have read a lot of threads about transferring to Garena thai but all of them told me that it is not possible. 
Reason  I am writing this threads because I spent more than 300 dollars on riot points and thinking to start off with lvl 1 it just too much.
So, I would really appreciate if you could tell anything about transferring to Garena thai server.

replies.body: We don't have jurisdiction over Garena regions, so I couldn't give you a clear answer on this.  Hit up[ Garena player support](http://intl.garena.com/support/), and they should be able to provide more details or options for you.  Best of luck!
